name: bot_git
packageIntro:
!BOT!

bot_io

A collection of helpers related to the file system.

!Build Status

Projects using bot_io

  • Hop: Dark Task Framework

Versioning

  • We follow Semantic Versioning.

  • We are not planning a V1 for bot_io until Dart releases V1. In the mean time, the version will remain 0.Y.Z. Changes to the minor version - Y - will indicate breaking changes. * Changes to the patch version - Z - indicate non-breaking changes.

Authors

  • Kevin Moore (+Kevin Moore, @kevmoo)
  • You? File bugs. Fork and Fix bugs. Send pull requests.
